name: Jay Freeman
headline: Story Headline
college: West Kentucky Community and Technical College
quote: I was hesitant to start an online learning program at first, but I'm so glad I did! The flexibility of being able to learn at my own pace and on my own time has been amazing. I've been able to balance my studies with my work and family life without any problems..

name: Grace Duncan
headline: Story Headline
quote: The nursing program at Henderson Community College thoroughly prepared me with the skills and tools necessary to be successful in my new career. Moving forward, I feel confident and competent in pursuing my BSN. I will be transferring to USI, but I will always be grateful for the incredible faculty, classmates and program here at HCC.

name: Aruturo
headline: Story Headline
quote: I was given the opportunity to do something different and I took it.

name: Alyssa
headline: Story Headline
quote: Don't miss out on opportunities. Grab them when they are there - and don't look back.
